description:
An Action-Puzzle game in the style of Old-School Legend of Zelda titles. The game is broken up into stages (currently 8). Collect Jems, buy items, solve puzzles, defeat enemies, conquer bosses and find secrets in this top down action game.

Each level explores different gameplay concepts and challenges and takes place in an interconnected world but in separate stages. Travel and explore the Long Road, get lost in The Forest, fight nimbly against The giant Bat, test yourself with the challenges of The Field, explore and solve the mysteries of The Sprawl and The Temple, and face The Blob that leaves giant streaks of slime wherever it goes.

A Gameplay Trailer is available here- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRSH9nJZQ6s
